Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Referee per le seguenti riviste internazionali: • Advances in Complex Systems • Cuadernos de Economía • Economic Modelling • Economics Bulletin • Economics: The Open-Access Open-Assessment E-Journal • Journal of Artificial Societies and Social Simulation • Journal of Economic Behavior and Organization • Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control • Journal of Economic Interaction and Coordination • Journal of Evolutionary Economics • Macroeconomic Dynamics • Metroeconomica • Oeconomia • Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications • Politica Economica: Journal of Economic Policy • Review of Keynesian Economics • Rivista Italiana degli Economisti / Italian Economic Journal • Technological and Economic Development of Economy • The Quarterly Review of Economics and Finance
Guest Editor, Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control (Special Issue: Large economic crises)
Guest Editor, Industrial and Corporate Change (Special Section: Advancements in Agent Based Modelling in the Wake of the Crisis)
Guest Editor, Journal of Evolutionary Economics (Special Issue: Economic Policies, Productivity and Sustainable Growth in the Wake of the Crisis)
Guest Editor, Macroeconomic Dynamics (Special Issue: Macroeconomic Modelling and Empirical Evidence in the Wake of the Crisis)

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Altre conferenze: • 4th Workshop 'New Tools for Qualitative Analysis of Economic Dynamics', Nowy Sacz (Poland). Paper: "Taxing Firms' Profit in an Agent Based Model: Consequences on Economic Fluctuations and Growth" (September 3-5, 2003). \\\\\\\\\\ • WildACE 2003 "Workshop on Industry and Labor Dynamics: The Agent-Based Computational Economics Approach", Moncalieri, Torino (Italy) (October 3-4, 2003). \\\\\\\\\\ • International Conference Schumpeter 2004 "Innovation, Industrial Dynamics and Structural Transformation: Schumpeterian Legacies", Bocconi University, Milano (Italy). Paper: "Technological Innovation, Financial Fragility and Firms Size Distribution Dynamics" (June 9-12, 2004). \\\\\\\\\\ • International Conference "Economic Growth and Distribution: On the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations", Lucca (Italy). Paper: "Technological Innovation, Financial Fragility and Firms Size Distribution Dynamics" (June 16-18, 2004). \\\\\\\\\\ • International Workshop on "Agent-Based Models for Economic Policy Design" (ACEPOL05), Bielefeld (Germany). Paper: "Business Fluctuations and Labor Market Dynamics in an Agent Based Matching Model" (June 29 - July 3, 2005). \\\\\\\\\\ • Artificial Economics: A Symposium in Agent-Based Computational Methods in Finance, Game Theory, and Their Applications, Lille (France). Paper: "Complex Dynamics, Financial Fragility and Stylized Facts" (September 15-16, 2005). \\\\\\\\\\ • European project STARFLAG meeting, Paris (France). Paper: "Bank branch dynamics in Italy: Collective behaviour and regime changes" (November 2-4, 2006). \\\\\\\\\\ • Net-Workshop, Reti: teoria e applicazioni. Due giornate di studio sui networks al confine tra economia e fisica. Università Cattolica, Milano (Italy). Paper: "Business Fluctuations in an Evolving Network Economy" (April 12-13, 2007). \\\\\\\\\\ • European project STARFLAG meeting, Budapest (Hungary). Paper: "Collective Phenomena in Economics: Branch Banking Dynamics in Italy" (November 1-3, 2007). \\\\\\\\\\ • International Conference on Economic Science with Heterogeneous Interacting Agents, "ESHIA/WEHIA 2008", Faculty of Physics, Warsaw University of Technology, Warsaw (Poland). Paper: "Business Fluctuations in an Evolving Network Economy" (June 19-21, 2008). \\\\\\\\\\ • 14th International Conference on Computing in Economics and Finance, University of Sorbonne, Paris (France). Paper: "Financially Constrained Business Fluctuations in an Evolving Network Economy" (June 26-28, 2008). \\\\\\\\\\

Invited Seminars: • PhD in Economics Seminar Series, Department of Economics, Università Politecnica delle Marche, Ancona (Italy); Paper: "Taxing Firms' Profit in an Agent Based Model: Consequences on Economic Fluctuations and Growth" (September 26, 2003). \\\\\\\\\\ • Seminar at the Department of Law, Economics and International Finance (DEFI), University of Parma (Italy). Paper: " The Economy as a Complex System and the Heterogeneous Interacting Agents Models " (December 6, 2004). \\\\\\\\\\ • PhD in Economics Seminar Series, Department of Economics, Università Politecnica delle Marche, Ancona (Italy). Paper: "Collective Phenomena in Economics: The Case of Bank Branches" (March 28, 2007). \\\\\\\\\\ • Lunch Seminar at UnicreditGroup, Milano (Italy). Paper: "Collective behaviour and Imitation in Economics: Branch Banking Dynamics in Italy " (December 11, 2007). \\\\\\\\\\ • Seminar at the Faculty of Political Sciences, University of Macerata (Italy). Paper: "Elements of Novelty, Known Mechanisms and the Fundamental Causes of the Recent Crisis" (April 28, 2010). \\\\\\\\\\ • Seminar at DISEI, Università di Firenze. Paper: “Increasing Inequality, Consumer Credit and Financial Fragility in an Agent Based Macroeconomic Model” (April 21, 2015). \\\\\\\\\\ • Seminar at National Bank of Poland. Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Corsi/moduli nell'ambito del Dottorato di Ricerca in Economia Politica dell'università Politecnica delle Marche • Agent-Based Macroeconomics (dal 2013) • Exogenous growth theory (2012 e 2013) • Monetary Policy (dal 2010 al 2012) • Agent-Based Models in Matlab (2008 e 2011) • Economics and Networks (2006)
